articles.author: Suvil Susvirkar
articles.title: Royal Enfield registers 133 per cent growth in May 2022 sales - BikeWale
articles.description: Royal Enfield sold a total of 63,643 motorcycles in May 2022 as against 27,294 vehicles in the corresponding month last year.
articles.content:
- Domestic sales grew by 167 per cent
- Exports grew by 40 per cent
- Year-to-date sales increased by 56 per cent
